elements.text: When you *Secure an Advantage* by sending your spider to scout a place, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

You may *Face Danger* +shadow by sending your spider to secretly study someone. On a hit, the spider returns to reveal the targetâ€™s deepest fears through a reflection in its glassy eyes. Use this to *Gather Information* and reroll any dice.
When your spider sets a trap, add +1 as you *Enter the Fray* +shadow. On a strong hit, also inflict 2 harm.
